1: 가르침이나 명령, 의도 따위를 소중히 여기고 마음속으로 따르다.

0: To take care of someone with respect; to cherish someone.
To cherish a teaching, order, etc., and follow it.
To lift an object with a hand or hands holding its bottom.

1: 머리나 뿔 따위에 세차게 부딪히다. ‘받다02「1」’의 피동사.
2: 한꺼번에 많은 양의 물품을 사게 하다. ‘받다01[1]「5」’의 사동사.

0: For a part of a person or object to hit another object hard.

1: 말을 서로 주고받거나 곁에서 채거나 하면서 농담이나 승강이질을 하다.
사람들에게서 돈이나 물건 따위를 거두어 받다.
다른 문화, 문물을 받아서 자기 것으로 되게 하다.

0: To collect and receive money, goods, etc., from people.
To not block an incoming culture or goods, and to make it one's own.
To grant someone's demand, request, etc.
To let someone join a certain organization, group, etc., as a new member.
To admit, understand, or accept a certain fact, state, etc.
To agree to an opinion, criticism, etc., and follow it.

1: 다른 사람의 공격이나 비판, 농담 따위에 대응하여 응수하다.

0: To answer upon hearing someone's criticism, joke, etc.

1: 넘어온 공을 다시 쳐서 상대편 쪽으로 보내다.
도매로 물건을 받아서 다른 사람에게 넘겨주다.

0: To hit the ball coming across and send it back to the opposing team.
To buy goods at wholesaler's prices and sell them to another person.
To take over someone's remark or song, and to continue it without hesitating.

1: 공경하여 모셔지다. 또는 소중히 대해지다. ‘받들다「1」’의 피동사.
몸을 움직이지 못하는 사람의 대소변 따위를 받아 처리하다.
다른 사람이 주거나 보내오는 물건 따위를 가지다.
다른 사람이 바치거나 내는 돈이나 물건을 책임 아래 맡아 두다.
다른 사람이나 대상이 가하는 행동, 심리적인 작용 따위를 당하거나 입다.
여러 사람에게 팔거나 대어 주기 위해 한꺼번에 많은 양의 물품을 사다.
2: (속되게) 부당한 일을 한다고 생각되는 사람에게 맞서서 대들다.

1: To take something that someone else has given or sent.
To collect money or an item that someone else gives.
receive; get; be affected by; be influenced by
To be affected or influenced by someone else's behavior or psychological action.
To get a score or degree.
To buy in large quantity to resell to a number of people.
To catch with a hand something that falls from the sky or comes toward oneself.
To be affected by a situation.
To receive or be exposed to light, wind, etc.
To receive or respond to an action such as a request, application, inquiry, attack, signal, etc.
To have a decision or ruling imposed on oneself.
To be generous to a person when he/she acts like a baby or behaves strangely after drinking alcohol.
To receive or let in a person.
be shot; be gunned; be hit
To be shot by a gun or hit by a sword, etc.
To sing or speak right after someone else speaks as kind of response.
To help a woman deliver a baby.
To collect the seed of a plant or the egg of an animal.
To purchase an alcoholic beverage, etc.
To let something that flows or falls into a container, etc.
For a color or shape to go well with something.
For food, etc. to be agreeable.
To look better in a photo than in real life.
2: To hit someone or something hard with a head, horn, etc.
(slang) To confront and argue with someone who acts inappropriately.

0: (honorific) To take what someone gave or sent.

1: 사람이나 동물이 남이 주는 것을 먹다.

0: For a person or animal to eat what another person or animal feeds.
(slang) To receive and keep money, goods, etc.
(slang) To receive money for something or doing something.

1: 남이 하는 말이나 읽는 글을 들으면서 그대로 옮겨 쓰다.

0: To write down what someone says or reads.

1: 먹은 것이 잘 소화되지 않고 위로 치밀다.
단단한 곳에 닿아 몸의 일부분이 아프게 느껴지다.
2: 물건의 밑이나 옆 따위에 다른 물체를 대다.
옷의 색깔이나 모양이 조화를 이루도록 함께 하다.
한글로 적을 때 모음 글자 밑에 자음 글자를 붙여 적다.

0: To put an object or body part under another object or body part.
To wear certain clothes that are matching in color or shape together.
To write a consonant under a vowel in the Korean alphabet.
To support in order to do something well.
To hold up an umbrella, parasol, etc., to block the rain or sunlight.
